meanings.definition: A substance or preparation for killing germs, designed for use especially on food-processing equipment.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant used sanitizers to clean the kitchen equipment.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to use sanitizers on the cutting boards to prevent contamination.
meanings.sent3: The sanitizers danced around the kitchen, making sure everything was germ-free.
meanings.sent4: The power of sanitizers transformed the dirty surfaces into sparkling clean ones.
meanings.sent5: The strong smell of sanitizers filled the air, assuring everyone of a hygienic environment.

meanings.definition: A substance or preparation for killing germs, designed for use especially on the skin.
meanings.sent1: After playing outside, the children used sanitizers to clean their hands.
meanings.sent2: It is important to carry sanitizers with you to keep your hands clean.
meanings.sent3: The sanitizers giggled as they rid the hands of all the germs.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the effectiveness of sanitizers on her skin.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of sanitizers on his hands was like a refreshing wave of cleanliness.
